column4: hello room, is the release candidate of 8.04 the same compilation that is coming out in 2 more days? because i want to download it, would you recommend waiting 2 more days or is it for sure that the candidate is going to be it ? TIA
yes, you can install the RC now. and by just regualr updates, you will be moved to the final release
yes. any changes, however, will come as an update.
